DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether supplement of plant sterol could lower blood cholesterol.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Plant Sterol Supplement on Blood Cholesterol
DOC.criteria: Men and women 1880 years old Total cholesterol: 4.57.5 mmol/l Triglycerides at or below 4.0 mmol/l BMI at or above 35 kg/m2 Secondary hyperlipidemia, included diabetes Hypertension (at og higher than 170/110) Coronar, perifery or cerebral vascular disease last 3 months Familial hypercholesterolemia Change in dose of statins, oestrogen or contraceptives last 3 months Taking drugs which are known to interfere with the plasma level of cholesterol Chronic rheumatoid diseases or other diseases known to affect creactive protein Pregnancy Lactation Planning to reduce weight Taking plant sterols
